title: Transformer-Based Visual Segmentation Techniques: A Survey

sections.description: Introduce the topic of transformer-based visual segmentation, highlighting its significance in computer vision. Discuss the motivation behind using transformer models for segmentation tasks and briefly mention the evolution of these techniques.

subsections.description: Discuss the importance and impact of transformer models on visual segmentation.

sections.description: Provide an overview of computer vision and visual segmentation techniques. Explain the traditional methods used in visual segmentation before transformer models and discuss their limitations.
